long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## All New Update For Tool in last Description ###

🎉 **Blogger Helper Tool**: The Ultimate Companion for Blogger Enthusiasts ✨  

The **Blogger Helper** tool is the first of its kind, crafted exclusively for the **Blogger platform** and tailored to bloggers who love sharing their thoughts and ideas on this platform. 📝💻  

We offer two versions of the tool:  
🔹 **Free Version**: A great starting point with essential features.  
🔹 **Paid Version**: Unlock advanced tools and premium capabilities (details below). 🚀  

With this tool, we've aimed to equip bloggers with everything they need, eliminating the hassle of visiting external websites or using third-party programs. Everything you require for **top-notch blogging** is right at your fingertips! 🛠️🎯  

💡 **Key Features You’ll Love**:  
- **SEO Optimization**: Ensure your articles follow best practices for better visibility. 🌟  
- **Error Tracking**: Identify and fix mistakes or duplications effortlessly. 🚦  
- Plus, a wide range of other tools to make your blogging journey smoother and more enjoyable! 🌐📈  

Get ready to elevate your blogging experience with **Blogger Helper**! 💪✨

🚀 **Exciting Updates for Blogger Helper Tool!** 🛠️  

🌟 **Version 1.2.5**  
  🖥️ Added viewport options: **Desktop**, **Tablet**, and **Mobile**.  
  🗑️ New feature to **delete unnecessary codes** from article.  
  🔍 Search in **Google** using a keyword, with results including:  
       **Similar words**  
       **Questions**  
       **First 10 search results**  

🌟 **Version 1.2.4**  
  📌 Shows **paragraph location (p)** directly in the editor.  

🌟 **Version 1.2.3**  
  🗂️ Display articles based on **categories**.  
  ✏️ Control the **number of words** in the description box.  
  🖼️ Identify images without **Alt attributes**.  

🌟 **Version 1.2.2**  
  📑 Added **Schema for Answer and Questions**.  

🌟 **Version 1.2.1**  
  🛠️ Fixed Some minor errors.  

🌟 **Version 1.2.0**  
  🛠️ Fixed errors.
  📋 include the **Schema Generator Tool**.  

🌟 **Version 1.1.8** (Part 2)  
- 🧮 Added a **post counter**.  
- 📤 Moved **Contact Us** to the main menu.  
- 🎨 Updated **styling** for improved appearance.  

🌟 **Version 1.1.8** (Part 1)  
  🌗 include The Dark/Light Mode.    
  🎨 Fixed **CSS styling issues**.  

🌟 **Version 1.1.7**  
  💬 Added a **Comments Section**.  

🌟 **Version 1.1.6**  
  🛠️ Fixed error in detecting **Open in New Tab**.  

🌟 **Version 1.1.5**  
  🔄 Added a feature for **social media sharing**.  
  🗺️ Restyled the **heading map**.  

 🌟 **Version 1.1.1**  
   🛠️ Fixed the issue of detecting **Arabic language** in the Windows.

 🌟 **Version 1.1.0**  
   🛠️ Fixed error in detecting **internal and external links**.  

✨ Stay updated for more enhancements! 💡
